SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.deck

Class RevisionSettingsFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.deck.RevisionSettingsFXMLController
@Component public class RevisionSettingsFXMLController extends FXMLController
Controller for managing the settings of a deck's revision algorithm.

This view provides a graphical interface for displaying, adjusting, and saving the hyperparameters of the algorithm associated with a selected deck. Users can modify settings and persist the changes.

    • RevisionSettingsFXMLController

      public RevisionSettingsFXMLController(MainStage stage, FXMLFileLoader fxmlFileLoader, TranslationService translationService, MenuBarFXMLController menuBarFXMLController, MenuDeckFXMLController menuDeckFXMLController, RevisionAlgorithmService revisionAlgorithmService)

      Parameters:
      stage - The main stage of the application.
      fxmlFileLoader - Utility for loading FXML files associated with this scene.
      translationService - Service for retrieving translations for the UI.
      menuBarFXMLController - Controller for the main menu bar.
      menuDeckFXMLController - Controller for deck-specific menu actions.
      revisionAlgorithmService - Service for managing algorithm-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • initWithParams

      public void initWithParams(Object... params)
      Initializes the view with parameters, setting up the deck and configuring the menu components. Binds the save button action to persist the modified settings.
      Overrides:
      initWithParams in class FXMLController
      Parameters:
      params - Array of parameters, where the first element is expected to be a `DeckBase` instance.

    • loadSettings

      public void loadSettings()
      Loads the current settings of the revision algorithm for display and modification. Each hyperparameter is represented by a label and an editable text field.

    • saveSettings

      private void saveSettings()
      Saves the modified settings back to the revision algorithm by validating and applying each input. Displays an alert if any field contains invalid data.

    • updateSize

      public void updateSize()
      Updates the size of the view components based on the window size and scale factor. Adjusts font sizes and component dimensions dynamically.
      Overrides:
      updateSize in class FXMLController

    • updateTranslation

      public void updateTranslation()
      Updates the text in the view components based on the current language settings.
      Overrides:
      updateTranslation in class FXMLController

    • updateView

      public void updateView()
      Updates the view by loading the settings and initializing the view components.
      Overrides:
      updateView in class FXMLController
